channel.title: 4 People got stabbed at a park
channel.description:
I was on the bus route to my friends house and saw that the police blocked off a few blocks, there was blood everywhere..
Apparently 4 people got stabbed, and one of the guys got stabbed 4 times.. one in the head, chest, and other parts of his body.
It was absolutely disgusting. If there's news about it tomorrow I'll post it in the news section but I'm just disgusted.. On top of that, some idiot in a van hit a car with a bunch of children inside, drove down the alley behind his house and made a run for it while the police were chasing him. This area is fucked up =|

item.title: 4 People got stabbed at a park
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

We were coming home from the store and there were 4 police cars that went by a Wendy’s. We were nosy and followed it, and there were 4 more police cars when we got there. It was blinding from 8 lights, but we could see a dog catch a guy hiding in the weeds and another guy being arrested. Pretty weird, does it really take 8 cops for only a drug bust?

Read full topic

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:10, topic:284806”]Sounds like London to me…
I live there are very day you hear that someone < 16 has been brutally stabbed and I fit prefectly in the age group, It really isnt nice![/quote]

Yay media hysteria
